source.647883ce:
android_clean = []
already_added_names = []

for i in android:
    name = i[0]
    reviews = int(i[3])
    if (name not in already_added_names) and (reviews == max_review[name]):
        android_clean.append(i)
        already_added_names.append(name)

source.db155447:
family_app_installed = {}

for i in intrested_app:
    name = i[0]
    installation = i[5].replace("+","").replace(",","")
    # print(installtion)
    installation = int(installation)
    family_app_installed[name] = installation
source.dfd4d60f:
cat_installation = []

for cat in unique_cat:
    total_install = 0
    count = 0
    for i in android_free:
            cate = i[1]
            if cat == cate:
                install = i[5].replace(',' , "").replace("+" , "")
                install = int(install)
                total_install += install
                count += 1
    avg_install = total_install/count
    cat_installation.append([cat , avg_install])
